summary: 今日焦点集中于大模型发布与前沿研究：GLM-5正式亮相，彰显国产大模型持续迭代；多篇顶会论文聚焦AI代理的可控性、不确定性建模与协作机制，尤其在医疗、知识库构建等场景展现新范式；同时，生成内容检测与人类监督框架成为安全治理关键议题。

news.title: GLM-5 Officially Released
news.comment: GLM-5正式发布，参数规模与训练数据显著提升，并引入DeepSeek稀疏注意力，属AGI关键进展

news.title: GLM 5 Released
news.comment: GLM-5发布，中国大模型再迎重大突破，开源生态与推理能力获业界高度关注。

news.title: A Small-Scale System for Autoregressive Program Synthesis Enabling Controlled Experimentation
news.comment: 小模型实现可控程序合成实验，降低研究门槛，具实用价值

news.title: Uncertainty-Aware Multimodal Emotion Recognition through Dirichlet Parameterization
news.comment: 轻量级多模态情感识别框架，融合Dirichlet不确定性建模与Dempster-Shafer融合，适合边缘部署，论文质量高且具实用价值。

news.title: PABU: Progress-Aware Belief Update for Efficient LLM Agents
news.comment: PABU提出进度感知信念更新框架，显著提升LLM代理效率与决策质量，实证效果突出。

news.title: CoMMa: Contribution-Aware Medical Multi-Agents From A Game-Theoretic Perspective
news.comment: Game-theoretic multi-agent医学决策框架，贡献感知与可解释性是亮点

news.title: FlyAOC: Evaluating Agentic Ontology Curation of Drosophila Scientific Knowledge Bases
news.comment: 首个面向AI代理的果蝇知识库本体标注评估基准，填补了端到端科学知识工程评估空白。

news.title: Human Control Is the Anchor, Not the Answer: Early Divergence of Oversight in Agentic AI Communities
news.comment: 早期社区分化揭示AGI监管路径分歧，具理论深度与实证价值

news.title: Overview of PAN 2026: Voight-Kampff Generative AI Detection, Text Watermarking, Multi-Author Writing Style Analysis, Generative Plagiarism Detection, and Reasoning Trajectory Detection
news.comment: PAN 2026 新增多项AI检测与文本分析任务，推动文本 forensics 领域标准化发展

news.title: Measuring Inclusion in Interaction: Inclusion Analytics for Human-AI Collaborative Learning
news.comment: 首次提出'包容性分析'框架，将包容性纳入人机协同学习的实时互动分析，具实用价值
